info.brief_description: Have fun going through spooky island as either human or monster while trying to survive.
info.description: In this choose your own adventure style story, you will be either a human or monster from the 2002 scooby doo live action movie. The story may contain gender bending, and sex of any sort. Do not kill any characters created only monsters. Try to use proper grammar and spelling but I will only care if it is really agreagus. Also do not use any characters shown in the movie, only the monsters and completely new people. Above all else when writing please try to theme all events around the powers shown in the scooby doo movie with the monsters.
